name: add raw sensors
description:
the world will send updates whenever it feels like it, and the value needs to be cached
the question is: should the data be cached 'out of graph' or 'in graph'
Answer: data is cached out of graph. This is more robust and will cover more sensor types. sensor shouldn't broadcast their value, the value needs to be read. the wumpus setup is non-standard
-----
so. we need raw sensors to read the sensor data and populate our internal representation
